response.overview: Shravanya wakes with no memory of two life-altering events. As she rebuilds her life, familiar faces and unsettling encounters awaken buried emotions, hinting that her past is not truly gone.  Caught in a cycle of love, betrayal, and fate, she must face whether she can break freeâ€”or is doomed to repeat it forever. Loop is a psychological thriller exploring memory, trauma, and the dark cost of forgetting.
response.title: Loop
